about.craft_text: Each piece is handcrafted by skilled artisans using only the finest materials. From ethically sourced diamonds to 18k gold, we ensure that every detail is perfect.
about.value1_text: We guarantee that every piece is made with genuine materials and expert craftsmanship.
about.value2_text: We are committed to responsible sourcing and working with suppliers who share our values.
about.value3_text: Your satisfaction is our priority. We offer a seamless shopping experience and dedicated support.

care.title: Jewelry Care Guide
care.subtitle: Preserve the beauty of your Bijoux pieces for generations to come.
care.general_text: Remove jewelry before swimming, bathing, or exercising. Avoid contact with perfumes, lotions, and household chemicals, as these can tarnish metals and damage gemstones.
care.cleaning_text: Clean your gold and diamond jewelry gently with warm water and a mild soap. Use a soft brush to remove dirt. For pearls, simply wipe them with a soft, damp cloth after wearing.
care.storage_text: Store each piece separately in its original box or a soft pouch to prevent scratching and tangling. Keep in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
care.maintenance_text: We recommend having your jewelry professionally inspected and cleaned once a year. Check clasps and settings regularly to ensure stones are secure.
care.gold_text: Gold is a durable metal but can scratch. Buff gently with a polishing cloth to restore shine.
care.silver_text: Sterling silver naturally tarnishes over time. Use a silver polishing cloth to remove tarnish.
care.pearls_text: Pearls are organic and delicate. They need moisture from the air, so wear them often!
